description:
Silhouette Studio allows you to access or create designs and send them to a Silhouette cutting machine.

Silhouette Studio is a robust, free design software that gives makers the freedom to imagine, design, and create unique craft projects. With dozens of design tools and easy integration with Silhouette cutting machines, Silhouette Studio is the ultimate tool for crafters who want to make their own unique, personalized projects.
Changes
- Fixed an issue where the wrong command was being sent when using the Sketch action on Cameo 5⍺ series
- Translation updates to the Czech language
- Translation updates to the Japanese language
- Updated to the Cameo Pro Mkii slideshow
- Stopped segments being cut twice when using Segmented Registration Marks
- Reduced the default number of passes for the Vegetable Tanned Leather from 2 to 1 on the Curio 2
- Disabled the Automatic Thickness detection by default for the Vegetable Tanned Leather on the Curio 2
- Removed the Leather Carving Knife from the Speciality Tools panel
- Re-enabled the link to the Silhouette Design Store
- Updates to the Cameo 5⍺ artwork
- Updates to Company logo
